Sammā ussito uggatoti ^b^samussito,^eb^ tasmiṃ. Olokentānaṃ, vasantānañca pasādaṃ cittassa tosaṃ janetīti ^b^pasādajananaṃ,^eb^ tasmiṃ. Ettāvatā vinayavinicchayakathāya pavattitadesaṃ dasseti, ^b^‘‘vasatā mayā’’^eb^ti kattāraṃ.

Devadattaciñcamāṇavikādīhi katāparādhassa, sītuṇhādiparissayassa ca sahanato, sasantānagatakilesādīnaṃ hananato ca sīho viyāti ^b^sīho,^eb^ buddho ca so sīho cāti ^b^buddhasīho^eb^. Seṭṭhapariyāyo vā ^b^sīha^eb^-saddo, buddhaseṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^Vuttassā^eb^ti desitassa. ^b^Vinayassa^eb^ vinayapiṭakassa. ^b^Vinicchayo^eb^ti pāṭhāgato ceva aṭṭhakathāgato ca ācariyaparamparābhato ca vinicchayo. ^b^Buddhasīha^eb^nti evaṃnāmakaṃ mahātheraṃ. ^b^Samuddissā^eb^ti uddisitvā, tena kataāyācanaṃ paṭiccāti vuttaṃ hoti. Iminā bāhiranimittaṃ dassitaṃ.
Ayaṃ vinicchayo mama saddhivihārikaṃ buddhasīhaṃ samuddissa bhikkhūnaṃ hitatthāya samāsato vara^b^pāsāde^eb^ vasatā mayā katoti yojanā.

Kimatthāyāti āha ^b^‘‘vinayassāvabodhatthaṃ, sukhenevācirena cā’’^eb^ti, anupādisesena nibbānapariyantānisaṃsassa vinayapiṭakassa pakaraṇassa ganthavasena samāsetvā atthavasena suṭṭhu vinicchitattā sukhena ceva acirena ^a^M2.0396^ea^ ca avabodhanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Bhikkhūna^eb^nti padhānanidassanaṃ, ekasesaniddeso vā heṭṭhā –
‘‘Bhikkhūnaṃ ^a^V2.0310^ea^ bhikkhunīnañca hitatthāya samāhito. Pavakkhāmī’’ti (vi. vi. ganthārambhakathā 2) –
Āraddhattā. Iminā payojanaṃ dassitaṃ.

3179. Evaṃ desakattunimittapayojanāni dassetvā kālaniyamaṃ dassetumāha ^b^‘‘accutā’’^eb^tiādi. Vikkamanaṃ ^b^vikkanto,^eb^ vikkamoti attho. Accutaṃ kenaci anabhibhūtaṃ, tañca taṃ vikkantañcāti ^b^accutavikkantaṃ,^eb^ accutassa nārāyanassa viya accutavikkantaṃ etassāti ^b^accutaccutavikkanto^eb^. Ko so? Rājā, tasmiṃ. Kalambhakulaṃ nandayatīti ^b^kalambhakulanandano,^eb^ tasmiṃ. Iminā tassa kulavaṃso nidassito. Kalambhakulavaṃsajāte accutaccutavikkantanāme coḷarājini ^b^mahiṃ^eb^ coḷaraṭṭhaṃ ^b^samanusāsante^eb^ sammā anusāsante sati tasmiṃ coḷarājini rajjaṃ kārente sati ayaṃ vinicchayo mayā āraddho ceva samāpito cāti. Iminā kālaṃ nidasseti.

3180. Idāni imaṃ vinayavinicchayappakaraṇaṃ karontena attano puññasampadaṃ sakalalokahitatthāya pariṇāmento āha ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^ vinayavinicchayo antarāyaṃ vinā yathā ^b^siddhiṃ^eb^ nipphattiṃ patto, tathā sattānaṃ ^b^dhammasaṃyutā^eb^ kusalanissitā ^b^saṅkappā^eb^ cittuppādā, adhippetatthā vā sabbe antarāyaṃ vinā ^b^sijjhantu^eb^ nippajjantūti yojanā.

3181. Teneva puññapphalabhāvena sakalalokahitekahetuno bhagavato sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitimāsīsanto āha ^b^‘‘yāva tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Mandāro’’^eb^ti vuccati ^a^M2.0397^ea^ sītasiniddhaekapabbatarājā. ^b^Kaṃ^eb^ vuccati udakaṃ, tena dārito niggamappadeso ^b^‘‘kandaro’’^eb^ti vuccati. Sītasiniddhavipulapulinatalehi, sandamānasātasītalapasannasalilehi, kīḷamānanānappakāramacchagumbehi, ubhayatīrapupphaphalapallavālaṅkatatarulatāvanehi, kūjamānasukasālikakaokilamayūrahaṃsādisakuntābhirutehi, tattha tattha paribhamantabhamarāmavajjāhi ca cāru manuññā kandarā etassāti ^b^cārukandaro. Kali^eb^ vuccati aparādho, taṃ sāsati hiṃsati apanetīti ^b^kalisāsanaṃ. ‘‘Kalusāsana’’^eb^nti vā pāṭho. ^b^Kalusaṃ^eb^ vuccati pāpaṃ, taṃ asati vikkhipati dūramussārayatīti ^b^kalusāsanaṃ,^eb^ pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhasaṅkhātaṃ tividhasāsanaṃ.

3182. Evaṃ ^a^V2.0311^ea^ okassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthahitasādhakassa sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiṃ patthetvā teneva puññakammānubhāvena lokassa diṭṭhadhammikatthahetumāsīsanto āha ^b^‘‘kāle’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kāle^eb^ti sassasamiddhīnaṃ anurūpe kāle. ^b^Sammā pavassantū^eb^ti avuṭṭhiativuṭṭhidosarahitā yathā sassādīni sampajjanti, tathā ^b^vassaṃ^eb^ vuṭṭhidhāraṃ pavassantūti attho. ^b^Vassavalāhakā^eb^ti vassavalāhakādhiṭṭhitā pajjunnadevaputtā. ^b^Mahīpālā^eb^ti rājāno. ^b^Dhammato^eb^ti dasarājadhammato. ^b^Sakalaṃ mahi^eb^nti pathavinissitasabbajanakāyaṃ.

3183. Evaṃ sabbalokassa lokiyalokuttarasampattisādhanatthāya attano puññapariṇāmaṃ katvā idāni viditalokuttarasampattinipphādanavaseneva puññapariṇāmaṃ karonto āha ^b^‘‘ima’’^eb^ntiādi. Iminā attano viracitaṃ paccakkhaṃ vinicchayamāha. ^b^Sārabhūta^eb^nti sīlasārāditividhasikkhāsārassa pakāsanato hatthasāramiva bhūtaṃ. ^b^Hita^eb^nti tadatthe paṭipajjantānaṃ anupādisesanibbānāvasānassa hitassa āvahanato, saṃsāradukkhassa ca vūpasamanato ^a^M2.0398^ea^ amatosadhaṃ viya hitaṃ. ^b^Atthayutta^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ vinayanādīhi yuttattā atthayuttaṃ. ^b^Karontenā^eb^ti racayantena mayā. ^b^Yaṃ puññaṃ patta^eb^nti kārakaṃ punātīti puññaṃ, pujjabhavaphalanipphādanato vā ^b^‘‘puñña’’^eb^nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ yaṃ kusalakammaṃ aparimeyyabhavapariyantaṃ pasutaṃ adhigataṃ. ^b^Tena^eb^ puññena hetubhūtena. ^b^Ayaṃ loko^eb^ti ayaṃ sakalopi sattaloko. ^b^Munindappayāta^eb^nti munindena sammāsambuddhena sampattaṃ. ^b^Vītasoka^eb^nti vigatasokaṃ. Sokaparidevadukkhadomanassaupāyāsādīhi vigatattā, tesaṃ nikkamananimittattā ca apagatasokādisaṃsāradukkhaṃ. ^b^Sivaṃ puraṃ^eb^ nibbānapuraṃ ^b^pāpuṇātu^eb^ sacchikarotu, kilesaparinibbānena, anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā ca parinibbātūti vuttaṃ hoti.
Iti tambapaṇṇiyenātiādi pakaraṇakārakassa pabhavasuddhibāhusaccādiguṇamukhena pakaraṇe gāravaṃ janetukāmena etassa sissena ṭhapitaṃ vākyaṃ.

Tattha ^b^tambapaṇṇiyenā^eb^ti tambapaṇṇimhi jāto, tattha vidito, tato āgatoti vā ^b^tambapaṇṇiyo,^eb^ tena. Byākaraṇamavecca adhītavāti ^b^veyyākaraṇo,^eb^ paramo ca uttamo ca so veyyākaraṇo cāti ^b^paramaveyyākaraṇo,^eb^ tena. Tīṇi piṭakāni samāhaṭāni, tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ samāhāro vā ^b^tipiṭakaṃ,^eb^ nīyanti bujjhīyanti seyyatthikehīti ^b^nayā,^eb^ nayanti vā etehi lokiyalokuttarasampattiṃ ^a^V2.0312^ea^ visesenāti ^b^nayā,^eb^ pāḷinayaatthanayaekattanayādayova, tipiṭake āgatā nayā ^b^tipiṭakanayā,^eb^ vidhānaṃ pasāsanaṃ, pavattanaṃ vā ^b^vidhi,^eb^ tipiṭakanayānaṃ vidhi ^b^tipiṭakanayavidhi,^eb^ tipiṭakanayavidhimhi kusalo ^b^tipiṭakanayavidhikusalo,^eb^ tena.

Paramā ^a^M2.0399^ea^ ca te kavijanā cāti ^b^paramakavijanā,^eb^ paramakavijanānaṃ hadayāni ^b^paramakavijanahadayāni,^eb^ padumānaṃ vanāni ^b^padumavanāni,^eb^ paramakavijanahadayāni ca tāni padumavanāni cāti ^b^paramakavijanahadayapadumavanāni,^eb^ tesaṃ vikasanaṃ bodhaṃ sūriyo viya karotīti ^b^paramakavijanahadayapadumavanavikasanakaro,^eb^ tena. Kavī ca te varā cāti ^b^kavivarā,^eb^ kavīnaṃ varāti vā ^b^kavivarā,^eb^ kavivarānaṃ vasabho uttamo ^b^kavivaravasabho,^eb^ tena, kavirājarājenāti attho.

Paramā ca sā rati cāti ^b^paramarati,^eb^ paramaratiṃ karontīti ^b^paramaratikarāni,^eb^ varāni ca tāni madhurāni cāti ^b^varamadhurāni,^eb^ varamadhurāni ca tāni vacanāni cāti ^b^varamadhuravacanāni,^eb^ paramaratikarāni ca tāni varamadhuravacanāni cāti ^b^paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanāni,^eb^ uggiraṇaṃ kathanaṃ ^b^uggāro,^eb^ paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanānaṃ uggāro etassāti ^b^parama…pe… vacanuggāro,^eb^ tena. Uragapuraṃ paramapaveṇigāmo assa nivāsoti ^b^uragapuro,^eb^ tena. ^b^Buddhadattenā^eb^ti evaṃnāmakena therena, ācariyabuddhadattattherenāti attho. Ayaṃ vinayavinicchayo racitoti sambandho.
Niṭṭhitā cāyaṃ vinayatthasārasandīpanī nāma
Vinayavinicchayavaṇṇanā.
Vinayavinicchaya-ṭīkā samattā.
